this is what i wrote to jared if u want to read it and try to figure out what happened:

i just want to say a bunch of things ok? ok here it goes..im really really sorry..i cried for over an hour and im still crying..i promised myself that after ashlee cheated on me that i was never going to put anyone through what i was put through..i felt soo hurt when she told me she cheated and when it actually hit me..i promised myself i would never do that to anyone i cared about..and the only reason i did it was i wasnt thinking..i was selfish and i wasnt considering the consciequences..im sooo sorry i did this to u..i understand if u want me to leave u alone and just move on but just listen ..i really do care about u and thats why im doing all this..this is why i cried for more than an hour..this is why i would do anything to get u back this is why i told u instead of keeping it a secr secret** i know doing the right thing now doesnt replace doing the thing in the first place but i do think i get a lil plus for it..not a lot cuz im a terrible person for doing this to u...u are a great person and there is no way in hell that u deserve that from anyone..especially someone u love..everyone makes mistakes i was just stupid enough to do one as big and life changing and hurtful as this one..and im terribly sorry about it..this made me feel so worse that i was thinking that i dont deserve to live..not when im going to be like that..but im not going to commit suicide it just crossed my mind..i love you and i never ever want to hurt u again..if u give me another chance i promise to make it up to u in any way possible i understand again if u hate me and if u want me to leave u alone i just wanted u to read all that cuz its all coming from the heart while im crying my heart out..call me if u are willing to give me another chance as a friend or more anything..i just dont want to lose u good bye..till when u talk to me or forever please think about it

why is YOUR livejournal annoying?
brought to you by Quizilla ya so sorry..umm im dating jared..im sooo sorry liz that i didnt tell u..i know i was wrong..im always wrong..i just didnt wanna hurt u ok? i know u say u would get over it but still u would hurt a lil and i didnt want that but i swear i will try to remember to tell u everything even if i feel its wrong..i will be truthful..that is what is key to a friendship jared says he loves me..he said he is sorry that he insulted me and he wants to do better so im not going to homecoming hes just taking me to dinner and a movie instead..im really really sorry i dont want to lose u and i know its hard to believe me i know how that feels cuz i find it hard to believe jared about things now..but im trying still..please dont leave me i really need u as a friend and ive lost enough friends..ur my closest friend and i really need u the most now..ur the only one i can go to..i wrote u a note btw today..so tell me when u want to get it..im really really really sorry..please just believe that if nothing else..i will do anything to prove to u that im really truly sorry..please liz just dont leave me..

just to say..my way of telling people important things is through this..so dont get mad at me ever for not telling u something if i actually put it in here..so sorry i havent been updating lately..my computer is so screwed up..its either going realllllllllllllllllly slow or wont let me get on the internet at all..but anyways i got a 91% on my bio test! yay and it boosted me up to 90% in the class when i had an 89% yay i have an A lol..on my spanish i got 100% on my math i got a 101% yay for good grades....krista is going crazy..shes basically being a brat..she told mallory that if i ever pick on danielle again that she will be mad at me when really im nice to danielle and its danielle that always picks on me with or without krista there and when krista is there she plays along with danielle and picks on me too so its just really unfair..shes being a really big brat and no one knows what to do..and mostly no one is going to homecoming..we are prolly all going to go to the game together but im still going to homecoming..hopefully at least one friend will go with me..but ya thats all love ya byes

Mr Mom: Lonestar. Oh, yeah, yeah, yeah. 

Lost my job, came home mad,
Got a hug and kiss and: "That's too bad."
She said: "I can go to work until you find another job."
I thought: "I like the sound of that."
Watch TV and take long naps.
Go from a hard working Dad to being Mr. Mom. 

Well, pampers melt in a Maytag dryer,
Crayons go up one drawer higher.
Rewind Barney for the fifteenth time.
Breakfast, six; naps at nine.
There's bubblegum in the baby's hair,
Sweet potatoes in my lazy chair.
Been crazy all day long,
And it's only Monday, Mr. Mom. 

Football, soccer and ballet:
Squeeze in Scouts and PTA.
And there's that shopping list she left that's seven pages long.
How much smoke can one stove make?
The kids won't eat my charcoal cake.
It's more than any man can take, being Mr. Mom. 

Well, pampers melt in a Maytag dryer,
Crayons go up one drawer higher.
Rewind Barney for the sixteenth time.
Breakfast, six; naps at nine.
There's bubblegum in the baby's hair,
Sweet potatoes in my lazy chair.
Been crazy all day long,
And it's only Monday, Mr. Mom. 

Instrumental break. 

Before I fall in bed tonight,
If the dog didn't eat the classifieds,
I'm gonna look just one more time. 

'Cause pampers melt in a Maytag dryer,
Crayons go up one drawer higher.
Rewind Barney for the eighteenth time.
Breakfast, six; naps at nine.
There's bubblegum in the baby's hair,
Sweet potatoes in my lazy chair.
Been crazy all day long, (All day long.)
Oh, been crazy all day long,
And it's only Monday, Mr. Mom.
Oh, Mr Mom. 

Balancin' checkbooks, juggling bills:
Thought there was nothing to it.
Baby, now I know how you feel,
What I don't know is how you do it.
Oh.

so yesterday i was at nicoles since i had spent the night at her house the night b4 and we woke up at 6 so we could get ready for pauls football game and so we got ready and went to naac and starbucks and mom called me and she said i had to be home at like 9 i was like oh no..im at naac so she got mad and hung up on me but nicoles mom ended up being nice and driving me home at 8:30 so my mom and i walked to the bus stop at 80th and kipling and went downtown..then we got on this really cool bus to go to grand junction..the bus was like a plane without the wings..we watched the patriot and it took 4ish hours to get to grand junction we got there and went to see the pete coors/ken salazar debate..coors..sounded idk not prepared? idk im all for ken so of course i think he did better but then we got on the bus at around 8:30pm and i was falling asleep but we all decided to stop at sonic so we did and i got popcorn chicken and i was going to get my jacket out of the bus but it ditched us lol of course it came back and we watched amegedon (sp) it was fun..then we were back downtown and my sister got us around 2am and i got home about 2:30 and i did some stuff then went to bed and got up at 8:30 oh and krista says shes over ryne and that shes going to like someone else..yay for her i just hope she sticks to it the mountains are gorgeous by the way..i basically looked at them for 3 hours straight. nice today is homework day..im going to mallory's house to work on our world history project since its due tomorrow..and tomorrow i get my letter award yay..i just dont know what to wear cuz we cant wear jeans we have to be dressy..so idk..but thats all love ya byes
